marklogic.body:
Then get Off the bandwagon and don't come back when the Heat start playing good again.
All these games don't mean a thing. When the playoffs come thats when things will matter most. Even if the Thunder beat the Heat at Miami it still won't mean a thing. Chicago won all their games against the Heat last year in the regular season, had the Eastern Conference's best record, ROY, MVP and in the end it didn't mean anything. I am just repeating all this in case you forgot. Miami doesn't have to worry about the Thunder in the 1st 2nd or 3rd round. So chillax
